text: TV Rocinha (TV ROC) is a Brazilian community television channel, a blend of pay television and community television, serving Favela da Rocinha, Rio de Janeiro. TV ROC received an award from the magazine "ARede" and had a project approved by UNESCO to improve the quality of the information conveyed. INTERNATIONAL PROGRAMME FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF COMMUNICATION == History == TV ROC was created in 1996 with a contract with Net Communication Services, enabled the creation of a combined pay-TV operator and a community channel. ==References== == External links == *Official page (archive) Category:Television stations in Brazil Category:1996 establishments in Brazil
title: TV Rocinha
